ingredients: a scant 2 cups mashed or riced potatoes, fresh or instant: 1
2 large eggs: 1
1 teaspoon salt: 1
2 cups King Arthur Unbleached All-Purpose Flour: 1
1 bunch (about 6 ounces) fresh flat-leaf (Italian) parsley, most of the stems removed: 1
3/4 cup fresh Parmesan cheese, grated : 1
3 to 5 large cloves garlic, peeled; to taste: 1
1 cup coarsely chopped walnuts: 1
1/4 teaspoon salt: 1
6 tablespoons olive oil or garlic oil: 1
